narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. At time of inspection there were no covered activities being 
conducted. The facility representative stated that there are no future plans to do regulated activities and that a letter to 
cancel their registration will  be submitted to the Animal Care office. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
